Summary: I saw three circular lights moving in the sky. At first I thought they were meteors because they were a red orange color.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was evening and I was standing by my car and happened to see these three lights come down as though they were meteors. They paused, leveled off and disappeared out of sight.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around June 30th 1964
